New Records: Sadeera Samarawickrama scored the Man of the Match for his unbeaten 91 off 107 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Sadeera Samarawickrama won Man of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Netherlands have registered a historical win against South Africa in this World Cup, but Sri Lanka are still looking for first victory in this tournament and are currently at the bottom of the table
